p: Informants’ consensus on medicinal uses was calculated for each species with the Fidelity Level index (FL) reported by Friedman in 1986 [ 203]. It was calculated as follows: Fl = Np/N × 100 (2) where Np is the number of informants who reported the use of a species to treat a particular ailment, and N is the total number of informants who mentioned the plant for any other disease.
